items.title: Bluedot Environmental Update
items.content_text: It’s been a big week for tidal here at#MRC2025! First, the announcement thatOrbital Marine Power Ltdwon two more berths at FORCE, and then news that the Fisheries Act Authorization has been obtained, the first tidal permit issued in 8 years. Team work makes the dream work and we are so proud to be a part of this phenomenal team.Orbital Mari…
